name: test_buy_random_one
description:
这个测试的是随机选择一种彩票,然后随机购买一注,记录并显示购买的结果
        with_login_cpc: 用于登录彩票页面
        with_open_lottery_page: 用于进入购彩大厅页面
descriptionHtml:
这个测试的是随机选择一种彩票,然后随机购买一注,记录并显示购买的结果
    with_login_cpc: 用于登录彩票页面
    with_open_lottery_page: 用于进入购彩大厅页面
statusTrace:
self = <test_buy_lottery.TestLotteryHall object at 0x04C59970>, setup_teardown = None

    @pytest.mark.flaky(reruns=5, reruns_delay=2)
    @allure.story('随机购买一注')
    @allure.severity('严重')
    @allure.issue("http://www.baidu.com")
    @allure.testcase("http://www.testlink.com")
    # @logger.catch()
    def test_buy_random_one(self, setup_teardown):
        '''
        这个测试的是随机选择一种彩票,然后随机购买一注,记录并显示购买的结果
        with_login_cpc: 用于登录彩票页面
        with_open_lottery_page: 用于进入购彩大厅页面
        '''
    
        # Arrange 准备工作
        with allure.step('测试准备工作:'):
            cpclogin.login()
            logger.info('开始进行彩票系统登录')
            lottery_id = cpclotteryhall.random_lottery_id()
            logger.info('选取的彩票id为%s:' % lottery_id)
            cpclotteryhall.open_lottery_hall(lottery_id)
            lottery_name = cpclotteryhall.get_lottery_name()
    
        # Act 测试步骤
        with allure.step('打开彩种页面'):
            allure.attach(lottery_name, '选择的彩种是:')
            cpclotteryhall.get_screenshot_as_file('D:\\caipiao\\runner\\png\\demo1.png')
            allure.attach.file('D:\\caipiao\\runner\\png\\demo1.png', name='彩种截图', attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
        with allure.step('随机购买一注'):
            cpclotteryhall.select_random_one()
            cpclotteryhall.submit_ensure_buy()
            bet_name = cpclotteryhall.get_bet_type()
            allure.attach(bet_name, '下注种类是:')
            cpclotteryhall.get_screenshot_as_file('D:\\caipiao\\runner\\png\\demo2.png')
            allure.attach.file('D:\\caipiao\\runner\\png\\demo2.png', name='下注截图', attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
>           allure.attach()
E           TypeError: __call__() missing 1 required positional argument: 'body'
